question: Is it permissible to serve food during fasting hours in the month of Ramadan? In our Business of Internet Café?
answer:
QUESTION
We have invested in the Business of Internet Café, which serves Internet Services and Food (Café). The place of business is in a Non-Muslim country (Burundi). 70% of our customers are is the state Musafirin (Travelers) - United Nation Staffs and Peace Keeping Forces. If we arrange so that staffs who serve food are Non-Muslim, is it permissible to serve food during fasting hours in the month of Ramadan
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to serve food to non-Muslims and travellers in Ramadhaan.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
